questions.svg: <svg width="300" height="80" viewBox="0 0 300 80"><line x1="20" y1="40" x2="280" y2="40" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="20" y1="35" x2="20" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="80" y1="35" x2="80" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="140" y1="35" x2="140" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="200" y1="35" x2="200" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="260" y1="35" x2="260" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><text x="20" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">15</text><text x="80" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">16</text><text x="140" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">17</text><text x="200" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">18</text><text x="260" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">19</text><circle cx="80" cy="40" r="6" fill="#EF4444"/></svg>
questions.hint: The red dot is on the second number from 15.

questions.question: What number comes before 18?
questions.svg: <svg width="300" height="80" viewBox="0 0 300 80"><line x1="20" y1="40" x2="280" y2="40" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="20" y1="35" x2="20" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="80" y1="35" x2="80" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="140" y1="35" x2="140" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="200" y1="35" x2="200" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="260" y1="35" x2="260" y2="45" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><text x="20" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">15</text><text x="80" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">16</text><text x="140" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">17</text><text x="200" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">?</text><text x="260" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">19</text></svg>
questions.hint: Count backward one from 18.
